data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=SJBwCbwu_yAQ7kNvgHOzd-4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCrjcvHbnL09N_3ucYCmKhd8mBo3rnicAc935OuwlGRoQ&oe=666D56CC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=JwO2pzghps8Q7kNvgEdQ4ZU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDN_J2uVaot8Sjn9Hgho-no3wzCju4wVlH0z-NRoVC0sg&oe=666D8D1F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=cZJEtr3epqsQ7kNvgGtKby0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBRdoDMRe9dL5_BRa39TOrdWPVRr1_kXNk58oOULniExA&oe=666D7271)
